SpottingConfirm.name: 确定发现
SpottingConfirm.content:
玩家 {pPlayer} {pSkillName}觉鉴定上得到了 {pResult} 让 {pSpotters} 在场景 {pScene} 发现了 {pDoors} 扇密门和:
个隐形指示物
SpottingConfirm.forcecontent: Player {pPlayer} has requested for {pSpotters} in scene {pScene} to spot {pDoors} secret doors and these hidden tokens without a perception roll:

SpottingReport.content: You were able to spot {pDoors} secret doors and these hidden tokens:

PeekingSuccess.crit: {pName} critically succeeded at peeking a lock

PeekingFail.crit: {pName} critically failed at peeking a lock

Warnings.MacroSeekDeactivatet: This macro is currently not available, see setting "Perception macro use behaviour"

SplitInteractionDistances.name: Split interactions distances
SplitInteractionDistances.descrp: If the interactions distances for lock peeking and door moving should be split

InteractionDistance.name: 最大交互距离
InteractionDistance.descrp: 玩家与物件交互的最大距离（-1为无限）

UseArmsreachDistance.name: Arms Reach distance
UseArmsreachDistance.descrp: 用 Arms Reach distance 来计算最大交互距离

StealthyIntegration.name: Stealthy integration
StealthyIntegration.descrp: 使用Stealthy模组规则，stealth DC会在Perceptive和Stealthy模组之间同步

Peekablebydefault.name: 默认锁孔可被窥视
Peekablebydefault.descrp: 默认锁孔是否可以被窥视

LockpeekstandardSize.name: 锁孔的基本大小
LockpeekstandardSize.descrp: 窥视锁孔时使用的标准间隙尺寸，相对于门的尺寸（0-1）

LockpeekstandardPosition.name: 窥视锁孔时的锁孔标准位置
LockpeekstandardPosition.descrp: 窥视锁时使用的标准间隙位置，相对于门的尺寸（0-1）

StopPeekonMove.name: 当指示物移动时停止窥视
StopPeekonMove.descrp: 指示物移动后，即使仍在交互距离内，也会立即停止锁定窥视

PeekingDistance.name: Lock peeking distance
PeekingDistance.descrp: Maximum distance over which player can peek locks (-1 for unlimited)

GMConfirmPeeking.name: GM confrims peeks
GMConfirmPeeking.descrp: If the GM has to confirm every peek action

PeekingFormula.name: Peeking formula
PeekingFormula.descrp: Formalu used for peeking through locks (leave empty to deactivate)

PeekingDefaultDC.name: Peeking default DC
PeekingDefaultDC.descrp: Default DC for peeking through newly created walls

PreventNormalOpenbydefault.name: 禁止原版的开门模式
PreventNormalOpenbydefault.descrp: 设定是否让摆门和滑动门模式的门依然可以用左键一键打开

DoorstandardHinge.name: 门铰链标准位置
DoorstandardHinge.descrp: 设定门铰链的标准位置在哪

DoorstandardSwingSpeed.name: 标准摆门速度
DoorstandardSwingSpeed.descrp: 门的标准摆动速度，以度数为单位°

DoorStandardSwingRange.name: 标准的摆门可开门角度
DoorStandardSwingRange.descrp: 门可以摆动的范围，以度数为单位° ({min}:{max} 留空为无限制)

DoorstandardSlideSpeed.name: 标准的滑动门速度
DoorstandardSlideSpeed.descrp: 门的标准滑动速度，相对于门的尺寸 (0-1)

MovingDistance.name: Door moving distance
MovingDistance.descrp: Maximum distance over which player can move doors (-1 for unlimited)

ActivateSpotting.name: 启用主动察觉隐形物体功能
ActivateSpotting.descrp: 是否启用主动察觉功能（关闭能加强性能）

SpottingRange.name: Spotting range
SpottingRange.descrp: Maximum range in which tokens and doors can be spotted (-1 for unlimited)

ApplyRange.name: Apply ranges
ApplyRange.descrp: For which checks the ranges should be applied

UseBordertoBorderRange.name: Use border to border range
UseBordertoBorderRange.descrp: If the vision ranges should be calculated from tokens borders instead of their center

StandardVisionDirection.name: Standard vision direction
StandardVisionDirection.descrp: The direction used for vision cones, measured for unrotated tokens

SpottingConeRange.name: Spotting cone range
SpottingConeRange.descrp: An additional spotting range applied in a 90° cone in front of tokens (0 to in crease performance)

RangePDCModifier.name: Range perception DC modifier
RangePDCModifier.descrp: Perception DC modifer based on distance to spotable object (DCincrement/RangeIncrement, 0/0 to turn off)

Range3DCalculation.name: Range 3D calculation
Range3DCalculation.descrp: If the vision range should be calculated in 3D (instead of 2D)

UsePf2eRules.name: Use Pf2e rules
UsePf2eRules.descrp: If the Pf2e rules should be used, including differentiating between hiding and sneaking and the respective rules

AutoRerollPPDConMove.name: Auto reroll sneaking stealth dc
AutoRerollPPDConMove.descrp: If the sneaking stealth dc should be rerolled when a token moves (can be locked per token)

AutomateTokenSpottable.name: 自动化发现指示物
AutomateTokenSpottable.descrp: 当隐形状态改变后可以被发现的指示物设定会自动被改变

CritMethod.name: 大成功/大失败
CritMethod.descrp: 如何界定大成功与大失败

SimulatePlayerVision.name: 玩家视角
SimulatePlayerVision.descrp: 决定GM是否使用与玩家一样的指示物察觉算式 (只适用于指示物)

PassivePerceptionFormula.name: 被动察觉算式
PassivePerceptionFormula.descrp: 系统的被动察觉算式 (e.g. "10 + @actor.system.abilities.wis.mod + @actor.system.skills.prc.value", help can be found on the Github page of this module)

PerceptionKeyWord.name: 察觉关键词
PerceptionKeyWord.descrp: 用来识别察觉鉴定的关键词 (a string present in the flavour text of perception rolls)

StealthKeyWord.name: 隐蔽关键词
StealthKeyWord.descrp: 用来识别隐蔽鉴定的关键词 (a string present in the flavour text of stealth rolls)

AutoStealthDCbehaviour.name: 自动隐蔽行为
AutoStealthDCbehaviour.descrp: 当进行隐蔽鉴定时应该发生什么

applySystemStealthEffect.name: 应用系统隐蔽效果
applySystemStealthEffect.descrp: 当隐蔽鉴定后系统隐蔽效果应不应该应用

usePerceptiveStealthEffect.name: 使用Perceptive模组的隐蔽
usePerceptiveStealthEffect.descrp: 是否使用Perceptive模组自己的隐蔽"效果"

PerceptiveStealthFriendliesvisible.name: Perceptive stealthing friendlies visible
PerceptiveStealthFriendliesvisible.descrp: Friendly tokens will be visible to other friendly tokens, even if they are perceptive stealthing

syncEffectswithPerceptiveStealth.name: Sync perceptive stealth removel
syncEffectswithPerceptiveStealth.descrp: Removing perceptive stealth from a token will remove the set stealthing effects and vice versa

customStealthEffects.name: 自制隐蔽效果
customStealthEffects.descrp: 当指示物进行隐蔽鉴定时的额外效果 (Names or IDs, seperated with ";")

resetSpottedbyMovedefault.name: 当指示物移动重置被发现效果
resetSpottedbyMovedefault.descrp: 当主动察觉者移动是否重置一个隐蔽的指示物

IlluminationPDCModifier.name: 照明察觉DC修正值
IlluminationPDCModifier.descrp: 适用于不同光照等级的察觉 DC 修正值 (Dim-light,Bright-light , "0,0" for no modifiers)

UseIlluminationPDCModifierforAP.name: Use Illumination perception DC modifiers for active perception
UseIlluminationPDCModifierforAP.descrp: If active perception rolls should use the Illumination DC modifier for spotting

IlluminationAPDCBehaviour.name: Illumination perception behaviour
IlluminationAPDCBehaviour.descrp: Behaviour of perception rolls for different Light levels (Dim-light,Bright-light , "=,=" for default behaviour, valid key words: advantage, adv, +, normal, =, disadvantage, disadv, -)

Light3Dcalc.name: Illumination 3D calculation
Light3Dcalc.descrp: If the token illumination should be calculated in 3D (instead of 2D)

GMSpotconfirmDialog.name: GM确定发现
GMSpotconfirmDialog.descrp: 是否在进行察觉鉴定后为GM创建一个对话框，让GM在对话框中对发现的情况进行确认。

GMSpotconfirmDialogbehaviour.name: GM confirm Spotting behaviour
GMSpotconfirmDialogbehaviour.descrp: For which users rolling a perception check should create a dialog for the GM in which the spotting has to be confirmed

ShowfailuresinGMconfirm.name: Show failures in GM confirm dialog
ShowfailuresinGMconfirm.descrp: Shows tokens for which the perception check failed as unchecked entries in the GM confirm dialog

MakeSpottedTokensVisible.name: 让被发现的指示物可见
MakeSpottedTokensVisible.descrp: If actively or passively spotted tokens should be made visible

RevealAllies.name: Make allied tokens visible
RevealAllies.descrp: If actively or passively spotted allied tokens should be made visible too (only works with above setting)

LingeringAP.name: Active perception lingers
LingeringAP.descrp: If rolled active perception lingers after its innitial role until removed manually

LingeringAPRadius.name: Lingering active perception radius
LingeringAPRadius.descrp: The radius measured from the point of the original roll in which the active perception remains (-1 for unlimited)

LingeringAPDuration.name: Lingering active perception duration
LingeringAPDuration.descrp: The duration for which the active perception remains in seconds (-1 for unlimited)

RevealSpottedDooronClick.name: Make spotted door visible on click
RevealSpottedDooronClick.descrp: If spotted invisible doors should become normal doors when clicked

ForceInvertIgnoreRollKey.name: Force invert "Ignore Roll" key
ForceInvertIgnoreRollKey.descrp: Inverts the "Ignore Roll" key for all players and removes the client setting

GMReciveInformationWhisper.name: GM recives info messages
GMReciveInformationWhisper.descrp: If the GM should recive whispered player update messages

onlyMacroSeek.name: Perception only with Macros
onlyMacroSeek.descrp: If only perception Rolls made with the Perceptive macros should be considered

MacroSeekBehaviour.name: Perception macro use behaviour
MacroSeekBehaviour.descrp: Under which conditions only perception Rolls made with Perceptive macros are considered

SpottedSound.name: Spotted Sound
SpottedSound.descrp: Sound played when a controlled token is spotted (path to soundfile)

SpotterImagePing.name: Spotter ping image
SpotterImagePing.descrp: The image with which spotters of hidden objects are pinged

SpotterImagePingDuration.name: Spotter ping image duration
SpotterImagePingDuration.descrp: The duration for which the spotter ping image persists (in seconds)

ActivateVCs.name: Activate Vision Channels
ActivateVCs.descrp: If the perceptive Vision Channels feature should be active

SimulateVCPlayerVision.name: Simulate player vision
SimulateVCPlayerVision.descrp: If the Vision Channel based player vision of the currently selected token should be displayed

VCRange3DCalc.name: Vision Channel 3D range
VCRange3DCalc.descrp: If the Vision Channel range should be calculated in 3D

ShowVCIDs.name: Show Vision Channel IDs
ShowVCIDs.descrp: If the internal Vision Channel IDs should be displayed in the Menu

vRequiredOrBehaviour.name: Use logical OR mode
vRequiredOrBehaviour.descrp: If required Vision Channels should operate on a logical OR instead of a logical AND

showPerceptiveWalls.name: Show Perceptive walls [DEBUG]
showPerceptiveWalls.descrp: If Perceptive walls should be visible in the wall layer (for debug purposes)

recreatePerceptiveWalls.name: Recreate Perceptive walls on scene load [DEBUG]
recreatePerceptiveWalls.descrp: If Perceptive walls should be recreated when a scene is reloaded (for debug purposes)

followTokens.name: 跟随指示物
followTokens.descrp: 是否让画面跟随选择的指示物移动

MessagePopUps.name: Message popups
MessagePopUps.descrp: If messages popups for moving doors and peeking locks should be shown

moveDoorControls.name: 移动门的控制Move door controls
moveDoorControls.descrp: 是否让门的控制与墙一起移动

SpeedDoorMovefactor.name: 门的开门速度
SpeedDoorMovefactor.descrp: Speed factor when moving doors with alt+mouse-wheel

IlluminationIconPosition.name: 照明指示点的位置
IlluminationIconPosition.descrp: 决定照明指示点应该在指示物HUD的哪里

LingeringAPIconPosition.name: Position of active perception indicator
LingeringAPIconPosition.descrp: Where on the token HUD the lingering active perception indicator should be positioned

SpottingPingDuration.name: Spotting ping duration
SpottingPingDuration.descrp: How long objects spotted with an active perception roll should be pinged for (in seconds, 0 to disable the ping)

WhisperPerceptionResult.name: Show perception results
WhisperPerceptionResult.descrp: If the result of own perception rolls should be shown in the chat

WhisperLingeringAPremoval.name: Notify on lingering AP removal
WhisperLingeringAPremoval.descrp: If a notification should be shown in the chat, when the lingering active perception is removed

InvertIgnoreRollKey.name: Invert "Ignore Roll" key
InvertIgnoreRollKey.descrp: If rolls should only be recognised WHEN the set key is pressed

IgnoreRoll.name: 无视鉴定
IgnoreRoll.descrp: 长按这个按键来阻止Perceptive把这个鉴定应用于隐蔽或者察觉鉴定里 (can be inverted)

resetStealthSelected.name: 移除选择指示物的隐蔽
resetStealthSelected.descrp: 移除选择指示物的隐蔽效果和信息

MousePeekLock.name: Mouse Peek lock
MousePeekLock.descrp: Hold this button while right clicking to peek the clicked lock

MouseMoveDoor.name: Mouse Move door
MouseMoveDoor.descrp: Hold this button while scrolling to move the hovered door (can be left empty)

MouseMoveDoorFast.name: Mouse Move door fast
MouseMoveDoorFast.descrp: Hold this button while scrolling to move the hovered door quickly

canbeLockpeekedFlag.name: 可以被窥视
canbeLockpeekedFlag.descrp: 钥匙孔是否可以被玩家窥视

PeekingDCFlag.name: Peeking DC
PeekingDCFlag.descrp: The difficulty class to peek this lock (0 to turn rolls off)

LockPeekSizeFlag.name: 钥匙孔大小
LockPeekSizeFlag.descrp: 钥匙孔的大小，相对于门的尺寸 (0-1)

LockPeekPositionFlag.name: 钥匙孔位置
LockPeekPositionFlag.descrp: 钥匙孔的位置，相对于门的尺寸 (0-1)

PreventNormalOpenFlag.name: 禁止原版开门模式
PreventNormalOpenFlag.descrp: 决定是否让这扇门可以直接通过左键打开 (only moving doors)

DoorSwingRangeFlag.name: 可开门的角度
DoorSwingRangeFlag.descrp: 可开门的角度，以角度为单位° (min-max)

DoorSlideSpeedFlag.name: 滑动门速度
DoorSlideSpeedFlag.descrp: 滑动门开门的速度，相对于门的尺寸 (0-1)

PerceptiveStealthingFlag.name: 是否Perceptive隐蔽
PerceptiveStealthingFlag.descrp: 决定是否拥有Perceptive模组的隐蔽效果"effect"

canbeSpottedFlag.name: 是否可被发现
canbeSpottedFlag.descrp: 决定这扇门是否可以被察觉 (被动和主动)

PPDCFlag.name: 被动察觉 DC
PPDCFlag.descrp: DC to be spotted with passive perception (-1 则为不可能)

APDCFlag.name: 主动察觉 DC
APDCFlag.descrp: DC to be spotted with ative perception (-1 则为不可能, 留空则和被动一样数值)

SpottingRangeFlag.name: Spotting Range
SpottingRangeFlag.descrp: Custom range over which this object can be spotted (overrides world settings, -1 to turn off)

otherSkillADCsFlag.Title: Other active skill DCs
otherSkillADCsFlag.name: The active spot DCs for other skills (-1 for impossible):

SpottingMessageFlag.name: Spotting message
SpottingMessageFlag.descrp: Message whispered to the spotter of this object

LockPPDCFlag.name: Lock passive perception DC
LockPPDCFlag.descrp: Prevent this tokens passive perception DC from being rerolled on move

resetSpottedbyMoveFlag.name: 在指示物行动后重置被发现状态
resetSpottedbyMoveFlag.descrp: If the active spotters of a hidden token should be reset upon its movement

StealthEffectsFlag.name: 隐蔽效果
StealthEffectsFlag.descrp: Further stealth effects applied to this token when rolling stealth (Names or IDs, seperated with ";")

OverrideWorldSEffectsFlag.name: 覆盖世界隐蔽效果
OverrideWorldSEffectsFlag.descrp: If this tokens stealth effects should override the worlds stealth effects

SceneBrightEndFlag.name: Bright darkness limit
SceneBrightEndFlag.descrp: A scene darkness level below this value will be considered bright for this scene

SceneDimEndFlag.name: Dim darkness limit
SceneDimEndFlag.descrp: A scene darkness level below this value will be considered dim for this scene

TilePerceptiveNameFlag.name: Tile name
TilePerceptiveNameFlag.descrp: Name used by Perceptive for this tile (e.g. Dialogs)

MATTTriggerTileFlag.name: Triggered tile ID
MATTTriggerTileFlag.descrp: The ID of the tile triggered by the Lock & Key actions below (you may use different landings)

PeekingConfirm.name: Peeking confirm
PeekingConfirm.descrp: User {pUserName} want to lock peek a door, confirm?
